attributes.action: Implement full sanction on all Russian UK assets. Show Ukraine solidarity.
attributes.additional_details:
To clearly demonstrate the UK's position on the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
It is mistaken to believe that it would remove any "leverage" we have with president Putin, we have none.
It may bring hardship to the UK also through such measures, but longer term the UK must disengage with regimes that are a threat to all of our existence.
attributes.background: Comprehensive sanctions to be enforced on ALL individuals or company's that transfer funds to the Russian government assist in building the Russian war machine that threatens world peace and encourages autocrats vs democratic decency

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
